page.title: 06Changing times
page.content: There is also an old farm beside the mill.This used to be a big important farm but now it is not being used at all. Back in the 1970's it was being used a lot with mostly cattle.Some of the 350 acres was used for silage. The{MANOR HOUSE SCHOOL }outside { {MILFORD,}which was once a private girl's boarding school, has in recent years become a home for mentally and physically handicapped children.At one time this school provided the young ladies of the area with an extensive education.However with changing trends in education it eventually closed, was taken over by the health service and made into a school for those children unable to attend normal school.
